# Changelog

## 0.2.0 (2025-10-23)

### Changed

- Implement changes from specification 0.2.0.

### Fixed

- Fix bug when parsing identifiers with underscores or hyphens.

### Removed

- Unused `serde` feature.

## 0.1.1 (2025-10-22)

### Changed

- Implement changes from specification 0.1.1.
- Update README.
- Reuse buffers for visitors.

### Removed

- Unused types module.

## 0.1.0 (2025-10-20)

Initial release.
